# üîê Alchemy API Key (Node API - RPC)
# Copie da URL: https://eth-sepolia.g.alchemy.com/v2/SUA_API_KEY
# OU do painel "App Dashboard" > "View Key"
ALCHEMY_API_KEY=F7WGOxare2E3WPbjGiBFQ
APP_ID=7tqgjbm6wlwwbtk2
APP_NAME=neoflow-token

# üîê Etherscan para verifica√ß√£o autom√°tica (opcional, mas recomendado)
# Obter em: https://etherscan.io/apis
ETHERSCAN_API_KEY=WYII9Y7JICTMERA89H6P3X9C3JKTIW8V75

# üîë Nome da conta para deploy
WALLET_LABEL=neoflow-admin

# üåê Network padr√£o (Polygon Mainnet)
APE_NETWORK=polygon:mainnet

# NFT.Storage API Key
NFT_API_KEY=8e9d9918.bf190b2cf5654e37b656e0d4396211a9

# üåê Avatar IPFS (Lighthouse Storage)
AVATAR_IPFS_URL=https://gateway.lighthouse.storage/ipfs/bafkreiboigewtuwih7cfnxppte64l3zkktrb52serzloa4vqfrw5f3zh3i
AVATAR_IPFS_CID=bafkreiboigewtuwih7cfnxppte64l3zkktrb52serzloa4vqfrw5f3zh3i

# Paste this in your .env file
NEXT_PUBLIC_ALCHEMY_API_KEY=F7WGOxare2E3WPbjGiBFQ
NEXT_PUBLIC_ALCHEMY_POLICY_ID=90cd1509-c2e8-4ccf-b3a5-4bea5edf3de6
NEXT_PUBLIC_ALCHEMY_POLYGON_MAINNET_API_KEY=https://polygon-mainnet.g.alchemy.com/v2/F7WGOxare2E3WPbjGiBFQ

NEXT_PUBLIC_TOKEN_ADDRESS=0x59aa4EaE743d608FBDd4205ebA59b38DCA755Dd2
NEXT_PUBLIC_VAULT_ADDRESS=0x07E39107d4B35b64f9f2310B9A2B8e5262A4ee41
NEXT_PUBLIC_CLAIM_ADDRESS=0x407C037906d6441ECD4a3F9064eab2E6CF03b36b
NEXT_PUBLIC_GOVERNOR_ADDRESS=0xeA6cedF9eD5d67fd2785Dd1cb34F434477927bB0
NEXT_PUBLIC_GAMIFICATION_ADDRESS=0xfbD4b4e0Cd08d871042Db1D4CC47e7bb66d1aDE3

NEXT_PUBLIC_THIRDWEB_CLIENT_ID=a70d3d6d2ec826511ff9e31b0db2d0fc

TOKEN_NEOFLW_WALLET_LABEL=Token NEOFLW Wallet

PRIVY_ID=cmih9fnzr0cndl80dcszlohot
